name: Drone Control (Am Adem)
description:
Fly through enemy territory and use left over components from their debris in order to construct drones to aid you on your flight. Gear up and be prepared to take down the enemy capital ship.

All assets were created by me, save for the music credited below.

The following music was used for this media project: 

Music: Pamgaea by Kevin MacLeod
Free download: https://filmmusic.io/song/4193-pamgaea
License (CC BY 4.0): https://filmmusic.io/standard-license
Artist website: https://incompetech.com/
